p: γ-Decalactone is used as food additive in peach, apricots and strawberry flavours. Another important natural lactones are γ-octalactone 36 and γ-undecalactone 38 ( Figure 6). Both of them exhibit coconut flavour and are used for coconut, oakwood, cream and peach notes. Both natural isolates are extracted from coconut palm [ 83].
